review: It's rather annoying and lots of lag when using it with the cast tab on the computer. If you decrease the quility, use a good computer, and use a good router you can get okay experience. The "apps" must be sent from a cell phone or tablet running android or a chrome browser.To put it simple this device only works with Google software and is still very limited. I will be returning this, It's far from what they make it sound like. The only feature that is nice is sending any page and video to your TV wirelessly, but it does a poor job of that.
